definition: China Association of Amusement Parks and Attractions (CAAPA)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 You2 yi4 ji1 You2 le4 yuan2 Xie2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中国游艺机游乐园协会

sentences.english: We have a lot of fun at the fairground today.
sentences.chinese: 我们今天在游乐场上玩得很开心。

sentences.english: She had many friends in Palo Alto and loved having fun.
sentences.chinese: 她在帕洛阿图市有很多朋友，喜欢一同游乐。

sentences.english: We intend to have a ball at the amusement park today.
sentences.chinese: 我们打算今天到游乐场玩个痛快。

sentences.english: Huis Ten Boch is an amusement park near Nagasaki in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 豪斯登堡是位于日本长崎附近的游乐园。

sentences.english: So Mrand Mrs. White took their children to the funfair Mr.
sentences.chinese: 因此，怀特夫妇带着他们的孩子们去了游乐场。

sentences.english: Today the famous singer Zapp is coming to open a new ride. There are so many pepole.
sentences.chinese: 今天著名歌手扎普要来为一个新的游乐设施揭幕。

sentences.english: Country music even had its own theme park called "Opryland"where you can enjoy music shows and fun rides.
sentences.chinese: 在那儿你可以享受音乐表演以及好玩的游乐设施。

sentences.english: It's a lot of fun, It's like a big playground, you know.
Days Virginia , Busch Gardens, Chesapeake Bay Bridge-Tunnel Tour.
sentences.chinese: 三天维珍尼亚，万里长桥，普希花园游乐场。

sentences.english: The paradise was already Alices playground.
sentences.chinese: 这天堂已经是爱丽丝的游乐场。

sentences.english: I wanted no more riotous excursions.
sentences.chinese: 我不再要放浪形骸的游乐了。

sentences.english: He watched her as greedily as he had watched her in the playground.
sentences.chinese: 斯内普渴慕地望着她，就像游乐场上望着她时一样。

sentences.english: There is a carnie in the middle of the park .
sentences.chinese: 在公园中间有一个游乐场。

sentences.english: They are the playground of hordes of Hong Kong Chinese, especially at the weekends.
sentences.chinese: 这里也是众多香港人的游乐场，尤其是在周末的时候。
它是一个世界著名的游乐场。

sentences.english: The basement has been made over into a playroom.

definition: to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to rest/to relax/to take a break
outing in the country/to go on a hike/to go courting
